Durability.comm: Affordable and durable for light use.

cont.entity_a: Durable and long-lasting compared to other brands.
cont.entity_b: Some bits broke easily during use.

cont.entity_a: Comes in a compact, foldable pouch.
cont.entity_b: Comes in a roll-up case with Velcro strap.

cont.entity_a: Sharp and cut through wood easily.
cont.entity_b: Not the sharpest, requiring more effort to drill.

cont.entity_a: Good for casual use but not for heavy-duty projects.
cont.entity_b: Great for DIY projects but not industrial quality.

cont.entity_a: The set includes a range of sizes suitable for various projects.
cont.entity_b: Good price for a variety of sizes.

cont.entity_a: The product is well-priced and offers a good range of sizes.
Spade bits have a well-designed tip for smooth cutting.
cont.entity_b: The product is not well-centered and lacks sharpness.

cont.entity_a: Bits are not stable in the drill and can become dull fast.
cont.entity_b: Hex shaft is smaller than standard size.

cont.entity_a: The bits arrived with some pieces missing.
cont.entity_b: Some bits arrived bent and with damaged tips.

cont.entity_a: Well made and effective for drilling but require a pilot hole for some wood types.
cont.entity_b: Works well on standard dry lumber but struggles with damp treated wood.
Bits rust easily and some shafts are bent.
